step.note: 打桩，生产用户teseruser，类型“个人用户”

helper.name: helper.mysql.execute
helper.item: REPLACE INTO tb_customer set id='%s',username='%s', type='1', realname='汤启发',password=sha1(md5('%s%s')),salt='%s',phonenumber='15824564545',idcard_type=0,idcard_number='',zone_id=2,organization_id=2,reg_time='2014-10-24',username_changed=0,serial_number=''
